string.name: box_browsesdk_title
string.description: Default title for the Browse SDK

resources.string: Se ha producido un problema al obtener la carpeta.
Se ha producido un problema al realizar la búsqueda.

string.name: box_browsesdk_cannot_view_folder
string.description: Error message shown when the user does not have sufficient permissions to view the items in the folder or it is not available

resources.string: No puede ver los elementos de esta carpeta.

string.name: box_browsesdk_network_error
string.description: Toast message that indicates that an error occurred while performing an action

resources.string: Error de red. Inténtelo de nuevo.

string.name: box_browsesdk_session_is_not_authenticated
string.description: Toast message that indicates that the provided authentication session is not valid

resources.string: La sesión no se ha autenticado

string.name: box_browsesdk_no_item_selected
string.description: Toast message that indicates that an invalid item was provided to browse on

string.name: box_browsesdk_all_files
string.description: Title shown for the parent folder when it is at the root level

string.name: box_browsesdk_action_settings
string.description: Accessibility title for the settings menu action in the toolbar

string.name: box_browsesdk_action_search
string.description: Accessibility title for the search menu action in the toolbar

string.name: box_browsesdk_create_folder
string.description: Accessibility title for the create folder menu action in the toolbar

string.name: box_browsesdk_select_folder
string.description: Button text shown at the bottom of the activity to allow the user to select the current folder as the folder that should be returned

resources.string: Ya se ha creado una carpeta con ese nombre.
